title: qbic-pipelines/rnadeseq pipeline parameters
description: Differential gene expression analysis and pathway analysis of RNAseq data

gene_counts.description: Raw count table (TSV). Columns are samples and rows are genes. 1st column Ensembl_ID, 2nd column gene_name.

metadata.description: Metadata table (TSV). Rows are samples and columns contain sample grouping.

model.description: Linear model function to calculate the contrasts (TXT). Variable names should be columns in metadata file.

project_summary.description: Project summary file downloaded from the qPortal.

multiqc.description: multiqc.zip folder containing the multiQC plots and report.

contrast_matrix.description: Tsv indicating which contrasts to consider, one contrast per column. 1 or 0 for every coefficient of the linear model. Check contrasts docs.

contrast_list.description: Tsv indicating list of the contrasts to calculate. 3 columns: factor name, contrast numerator and denominator. Check contrasts docs.

contrast_pairs.description: Tsv indicating list of contrast pairs to calculate. 3 columns: contrast name, numerator and denominator. Check contrasts docs.

relevel.description: Tsv indicating list of factors (conditions in the metadata table) and the new level on which to relevel the factor. Check contrasts docs.

logFCthreshold.description: Threshold (int) to apply to Log 2 Fold Change to consider a gene as differentially expressed.

genelist.description: Txt file with list of genes (one per line) of which to plot heatmaps for normalized counts across all samples.

batch_effect.description: Turn on this flag if you wish to consider batch effects. You need to add the batch effect to the linear model too!

min_DEG_pathway.description: Integer indicating how many genes in a pathway must be differentially expressed to be considered as enriched, and report these pathways in tables and the final report. The default value is 1.

vst_genes_number.description: Integer indicating how many genes to subset to during vst transformation (when using rlog, will ignore this number). Default: 1000.

skip_pathway_analysis.description: Turn on this flag if you wish to skip pathway analysis.

use_vst.description: Set this flag to true to use vst transformation (recommended when >50 samples; if false, will use rlog)

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved

email.description: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

tracedir.description: Directory to keep pipeline Nextflow logs and reports.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
publish_dir_mode.help_text: The Nextflow `publishDir` option specifies which intermediate files should be saved to the output directory. This option tells the pipeline what method should be used to move these files. See [Nextflow docs](https://www.nextflow.io/docs/latest/process.html#publishdir) for details.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.
